entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
